message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $150. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within a certain budget. Can you meet me at $110?
I understand that $110 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $130. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $130 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. Can you do $115?
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with it!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise again, but $125 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. Can you do $118?
I can see you're really close to making a decision, and I'm willing to make one last compromise. I can offer it to you for $122. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with it!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise again, but $122 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. Can you do $119?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $121. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with it!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise again, but $121 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. Can you do $120?
